驔字的基本解释

驔
diàn
黄色脊毛的黑马。

驔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［diàn］
［《廣韻》徒玷切，上忝，定。］
(1)膝胫有长毛的马。
(2)见“驂驔”。

驔字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　驔； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1445第21
【唐韻】徒玷切【集韻】【韻會】徒點切，?音簟。【玉篇】驪馬黃脊。【增韻】馬毫骭白曰驔。言毫在骭而白也。【詩·魯頌】有驔有魚。　又【集韻】【韻會】徒南切【正韻】徒含切，?音覃。又【集韻】徒念切，音磹。義?同。

驔字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
驔字的起名意思

黄色脊毛的黑马。

驔
Basic explanation of words
驔
diàn
Black horse with yellow spine.
驔
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［diàn］
["Guangyun" is only tarnished, upset, fixed. ]
(1) A horse with long hair on the knee shin.
(2) See "骖驔".
驔
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【horse character department】　驔; Kangxi strokes: 22; page number: page 1445 21
[Tang Yun] Cut with only a little bit [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] Cut with a little bit,? Yin 簟. [Jade articles] Lima yellow ridge. [Zeng Yun] Ma Hao-li Bai said 驔. The words are in vain and white. 【Poetry·Lu Song】There are scouts and fishes.　[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] Tu Nanqie [Zheng Yun] Tu Hanqie,? Yin Tan. Also 【Jiyun】Only read and cut, and the sound is trembling. Righteous? Same.
驔
